actions.text: House Committee on Rules Reported an Original Measure. Report No: 98-292.
Laid on Table in House by Voice Vote.

official_title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 3021) to amend the Social Security Act to provide for a program of grants to States to provide health care benefits for the unemployed, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 3021 (unemployed workers health insurance).

titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 3021) to amend the Social Security Act to provide for a program of grants to States to provide health care benefits for the unemployed, and for other purposes.
